projects.title: Energy Management & Control of DC Microgrid
projects.description: Designing a power and energy control algorithm based on differential flatness theory to regulate the DC bus voltage in the microgrid. Implementing d-q axis controller of the 3-phase inverter for reactive power compensation.

projects.title: Sizing & Simulation of a Voltage-Controlled DC-DC Boost Converter
projects.description: Performing average modeling in continuous conduction mode. Performing matrix-based linearization and finding transfer function & equilibrium. Tuning the small signal control and verification of numerical simulation.

projects.title: Power Architecture of Heavy-Duty Hybrid Fuel Cell Trucks
projects.description: Reviewing different power architectures of fuel trucks. Selecting the best topology of inverter DC-DC converter for the power architecture. Researching component market proposing models of fuel cell, 3-phase motor, supercapacitor, battery, inverter.

projects.title: Renewable Energy Supply to University of Lorraine
projects.description: Designing a grid-connected PV system to increase self-consumption of UL. Sizing of PV panels, energy storage based on LCOE, ROI & loss of load probability.
